ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISCHANGED(Status__c),
OR( AND( TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status__c)) = "Open", TEXT(Status__c) <> "Assigned" ),
AND( TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status__c)) = "Assigned", TEXT(Status__c) <> "In Progress" ),
AND( TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status__c)) = "In Progress", TEXT(Status__c) <> "Testing" ),
AND( TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status__c)) = "Testing", TEXT(Status__c) <> "Completed" ) ) )
